## 1. Graphical models

```{r}
library(bnlearn)
data("lizards")

dag = model2network("[Species][Diameter|Species][Height|Species]")
graphviz.plot(dag, shape = "ellipse")

ci.test("Height", "Diameter", "Species", test = "mi", data = lizards)
ci.test("Height", "Diameter", "Species", test = "x2", data = lizards)


```
